# Introduction 

```{r}
library(APES)
```

# Example 
```{r}
set.seed(10)
n = 100
p = 10
k = 1:10
beta = c(1, -1, rep(0, p-2))
x = matrix(rnorm(n*p), ncol = p)
colnames(x) = paste0("X", 1:p)
y = rbinom(n = n, size = 1, prob = expit(x %*% beta))

M = glm(y ~ x, family = "binomial")
APES(M)
```
